Rank.Description: Increases movement speed by 2%. Increases damage done by 1%.
Increases movement speed by 4%. Increases damage done by 2%.
Increases movement speed by 6%. Increases damage done by 3%.
Increases movement speed by 8%. Increases damage done by 4%.
Increases movement speed by 10%. Increases damage done by 5%.
Increases damage done by the Primal Companion by 2%.
Increases damage done by the Primal Companion by 4%.
Increases damage done by the Primal Companion by 6%.
Increases damage done by the Primal Companion by 8%.
Increases damage done by the Primal Companion by 10%.

Ability.Description: Reduces incoming damage by 5% on all Party or Raid members for 20s after a successful Finisher. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Call of Stone ability.
Hitting with Fierce Strike increases the damage that your Pet does by 3% for 12 seconds.
Hitting with Fierce Strike increases the damage that your Pet does by 6% for 12 seconds.
Hitting with Fierce Strike increases the damage that your Pet does by 9% for 12 seconds.
Hitting with Fierce Strike increases the damage that your Pet does by 12% for 12 seconds.
Hitting with Fierce Strike increases the damage that your Pet does by 15% for 12 seconds.
Increase the Critical Hit chance of the Primal Companion by 2%.
Increase the Critical Hit chance of the Primal Companion by 4%.
Increase the Critical Hit chance of the Primal Companion by 6%.
Increases the Base Damage of damage over time effects by 2%.
Increases the Base Damage of damage over time effects by 4%.
Increases the Base Damage of damage over time effects by 6%.

Ability.Description: Heals 900 to 995 Health in addition to 123 Health per damage over time effect on the enemy up to 5.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Primal Heal ability.
15% of healing done to you also heals your Primal Companion.
30% of healing done to you also heals your Primal Companion.

Ability.Description: Increases Attack Power and Spell Power by 15% on all party or raid members for 20s.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Command to Attack ability.
Melee critical hits inflicted by you and your pet also deal 10% of your strength or your pet's strength over 8 seconds.
Melee critical hits inflicted by you and your pet also deal 20% of your strength or your pet's strength over 8 seconds.
Melee critical hits inflicted by you and your pet also deal 30% of your strength or your pet's strength over 8 seconds.
Melee critical hits inflicted by you and your pet also deal 40% of your strength or your pet's strength over 8 seconds.
Melee critical hits inflicted by you and your pet also deal 50% of your strength or your pet's strength over 8 seconds.

Ability.Description:
Summons a Greater Primal Companion (max level 28).
Damage taken by the pet from AE abilities is reduced by 65%, plus an additional 1% for every point spent in the Beastmaster soul level above 21.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Summon Primal Companion ability.
Increases you and your pet's maximum Health by 4%, and damage by 2% while your pet is active.
Increases you and your pet's maximum Health by 8%, and damage by 4% while your pet is active.
Increases you and your pet's maximum Health by 12%, and damage by 6% while your pet is active.
Physical damage over time damage is increased by 5%.
Physical damage over time damage is increased by 10%.
Physical damage over time damage is increased by 15%.
Increases the Primal Companion's damage by 5%.
Increases the Primal Companion's damage by 10%.
Increases the Primal Companion's damage by 15%.
Increases the Primal Companion's damage by 20%.
Increases the Primal Companion's damage by 25%.
Increases Duration on Calls and Commands by 5 seconds. Increases the range of Fierce Strike and Brutal Strike by 10m.
Increases Duration on Calls and Commands by 10 seconds. Increases the range of Fierce Strike and Brutal Strike by 20m.
Increase your pet's maximum health by 10%. Reduces the cost of Beastmaster abilities by 2%.
Increase your pet's maximum health by 20%. Reduces the cost of Beastmaster abilities by 4%.
Increase your pet's maximum health by 30%. Reduces the cost of Beastmaster abilities by 6%.

Ability.Description: Heals Party or Raid members 811 Health over 20s after a successful Finisher. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Call of Kinship ability.

Ability.Description: Restores 1027 to 1135 health to up to 5 party or raid members.

Rank.Description: Causes Guardianship to restore additional health over 6s.
Your Fierce Strike has a 50% chance to remove 1 buff from the enemy.
Your Fierce Strike has a 100% chance to remove 1 buff from the enemy.
Reduces the cast time of your Summon by 50%.

Ability.Description: Puts an enemy to Sleep for 8s. Can only affect 1 enemy.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Calming Influence ability.

Ability.Description: Deals 1248 to 1380 Physical damage in addition to increasing the damage done by the Beastmaster and their Primal Companion by 4% per damage over time on the enemy, up to 5 for 20s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Cunning Ruse ability.
Beastmaster Bleed effects from Abilities last for an additional hit.
Beastmaster Bleed effects from Abilities last for an additional 2 hits.

Ability.Description: Deals 937 to 1036 Physical damage. Deals an additional 15% damage per damage over time effect on the Enemy, up to 75%. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Vicious Blow ability.

Ability.Description: Increases current and Maximum Health by 25%, Armor and Resistances by 10% on all party or raid members for 20s.
Deals 694 to 767 Physical damage. Bleeds 1168 health over 15s, in addition to 1168 health over 15s from a second wound.

AbilityRank.Description: Increases Attack Power and Spell Power by 15% on all party or raid members for 20s.

Deals 1248 to 1380 Physical damage in addition to increasing the damage done by the Beastmaster and their Primal Companion by 4% per damage over time on the enemy, up to 5 for 20s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Deals Physical damage per Attack Point. Deals additional 30% damage per damage over time effect on the Enemy, up to 150%:
1 Point: 545 damage 2 Points: 824 damage 3 Points: 1244 damage
Deals 627 to 693 Physical damage. Bleeds 1460 health over 15s. Can be stacked up to 3 times.

Increases the Critical Hit damage of the Warrior and their Primal Companion by 1%, and their damage by 3% for 15s. Each damage over time effect on the enemy multiplies these values, up to 5. This ability is not affected by the Global Cooldown.
Increases damage done by 5% on all party or raid members for 20s after a successful Finisher. Lasts 1h.
Heals Party or Raid members 811 Health over 20s after a successful Finisher. Lasts 1h.

Deals 694 to 767 Physical damage. Bleeds 1168 health over 15s, in addition to 1168 health over 15s from a second wound.
Increases healing done by 15% on all party or raid members for 20s.
Deals 1398 to 1545 Physical damage in addition to 192 Physical damage per damage over time effect on the Enemy, up to 5. Must be used after the Warrior's pet Critically Hits.
Causes the enemy to take an additional 634 Physical damage when hit. Each attacker may trigger this once every 3s. Lasts 20s.
Deals 937 to 1036 Physical damage. Deals an additional 15% damage per damage over time effect on the Enemy, up to 75%. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Increases current and Maximum Health by 25%, Armor and Resistances by 10% on all party or raid members for 20s.

Heals 900 to 995 Health in addition to 123 Health per damage over time effect on the enemy up to 5.
Increases Armor by 2000 and Resistances by 27 on all party or raid members.
Causes the enemy to take an additional 15% damage from the Warrior's attacks for 30s. This Ability is not affected by the Global Cooldown.

Assaults the enemy with primal energy, causing the enemy to bleed 2733 health over 10s. Increases party and raid member Damage by 5%, Critical Hit Chance by 5%, and Critical Hit Power by 10%. Increases the Primal Companion's damage by 25%, Critical Hit Chance by 25%, and Critical Hit Power by 50%. Lasts 10s.
Increases Critical Hit chance by 5% on all Party or Raid members for 20s after a successful Finisher. Lasts 1h.

Summons a Greater Primal Companion (max level 28).
Damage taken by the pet from AE abilities is reduced by 65%, plus an additional 1% for every point spent in the Beastmaster soul level above 21.
Finishers gain a bonus to Attack Power contribution based on how many Attack Points were consumed.
Summons a Lesser Primal Companion (max level 36).
Increases movement speed of all Party or Raid members by 15%.

Dismiss your Pet.
